Post-Match Reflections: Klay Thompson expressed pride in his team's effort after the comeback win.
The coach highlighted the victory as a crucial step toward the championship.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Klay Thompson's return to the Bay Area and his first time facing the team he played with for 13 seasons.
Hundreds of employees greeted him at the player’s entrance, and the Warriors ran a touching tribute video when introducing him.
Thompson spent significant time roaming through the home team’s facilities, mingling with former co-workers.
Thompson played it perfectly, hitting his former teammates with a little bit of trash talk, and imitating Curry's shimmy after a made three.
Curry and Draymond Green embraced Thompson with huge hugs pre and post-game, and offered nothing but effusive praise and gracious platitudes in interviews.
